attributes.action: Become compulsory to have self defence lessons in school as part of P. E lessons
attributes.additional_details: With the rising crime related incidents I think it will help people feel safe if self defence is taught giving you extra security
attributes.background: It should be law for your children to learn basic self defense lessons in school as part of P. E.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578987:
